short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Now customize the color of page as you want.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Color Picker Chrome Extension is a powerful tool that allows users to effortlessly customize the color scheme of their browser pages according to their preferences. With a user-friendly interface, this extension provides a seamless experience for choosing and applying colors to the browser background, text, links, and elements.
